Package fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl

Class SimpleTree<N extends TreeNode>

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleTree<N>
Type Parameters:
N - the implementation of TreeNode used in this tree
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeSet<N>, Tree<N>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
public class SimpleTree<N extends TreeNode> extends Object implements Tree<N>

A simple implementation of Tree. It is actually a forest, i.e. it may have more than one root.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 13 mai 2019
